Package com.linkedin.alpini.netty4.http2

Class Http2ClientResponseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
          • com.linkedin.alpini.netty4.http2.Http2ClientResponseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler
    public class Http2ClientResponseHandler
extends io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
    A handler which processes HttpRequest objects decorated with HttpClientResponseHandler.ResponseConsumer interface written to the pipeline and transforms it into HTTP/2 frames as well as handle responding HTTP/2 frames and marshalling them to the response consumer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler.Sharable

    • Constructor Detail

      • Http2ClientResponseHandler

        public Http2ClientResponseHandler()

      • Http2ClientResponseHandler

        public Http2ClientResponseHandler​(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpScheme httpScheme,
                                  boolean validateHeaders,
                                  java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> failedToWriteHeaderFrame)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        httpScheme - default HttpScheme if a scheme is not already set.
        validateHeaders - true to validate header names according to * rfc7540. false to not validate header names.
        failedToWriteHeaderFrame - Callback which is called for every time we fail to write the initial Http2HeaderFrame to the channel - which would occur when no more streams can be created.
